John, did the plugin.xml of the plug-in in question have the OSGi format?  
i.e. a <plugin> element with only <extension> children.
If so, this would be a duplicate of bug 50703, as PDE is not ready to support 
the building of such plug-ins yet.

Created an attachment (id=7867)
The plugin.xml file for org.eclipse.update.configurator

Actually the opposite, it has requires and runtime but no extensions or
extension points. Looks like a vanilla 2.1 plugin.
I was able to generate an ant file on 200402120800 without any problems.
we now guard against a possible NPE returned by IResource.getLocation()
